17.title: APOZ was Introduced and Presented to a Global E-Bike Giant
17.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), ASC Global team met with the delegation from AIMA Technology Group led by its senior executive management team on October 28th in Sarasota, Florida.
17.p2: According to Mr. David Champ, the President & CEO of the company, AIMA E-Bike is a global leader in electric two-wheel mobility, specialized in stylish, high-performance e-bikes, e-scooters, and electric motorcycles, with annual sales exceeds $3 billion dollars worldwide (U.S., Europe and Southeast Asia).
17.p3: AIMA E-Bike already has its dealer network in the U.S. and is now seeking an ideal location for R & D and final assembly in the Sunbelt States area. After a detailed and thorough introduction of APOZ presented to the delegation, they are very impressed with the FTZ & QOZ dual-status tariff benefits and tax incentives of APOZ (Asia Pacific Opportunity Zone), and expressed strong interests to explore and discuss further with ASC Global Inc.
17.p4: AIMA is well known for its advanced technical innovations, such as Azure Controller: a proprietary smart energy system (re-Gen) that recaptures kinetic energy during braking or down hill riding to extend battery range, Hydraulic Disc Brakes and Superior Range (many models exceed 100 KM per charge with smart energy recovery systems and lithium ion battery system).
17.p5: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.

16.title: APOZ Team is Excited to Receive a Rare Earth Delegation from Asia
16.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), is making an announcement today that a rare earth trade delegation from Asia is coming to visit APOZ next week.
16.p2: According to Mr. David Champ, the President & CEO of the company, a MOU of bilateral cooperation was executed with this rare earth company on June 8th this year, and an invitation was issued to this delegation shortly after.
16.p3: On August 1st, this delegation received visa approval from the U.S. General Consulate for coming to visit APOZ and conduct further discussion about setting up operation at APOZ in Texas. On the other hand, ASC Global Inc. has been exploring the feasibility of building a joint-venture entity in Vietnam for rare earth mining for many months already since late last year.
16.p4: The proposed operation at APOZ will be the final stage of Precipitation and Conversion (purified REFs are precipitated as oxalates/hydroxides, then calcined to form Rare Earth Oxides). These oxides will then be further reduced to metals using electrolysis and/or metallothermic reduction.
16.p5: David Champ further stated, this delegation will land and arrive in New York on the 20th of October, and then meet up with the APOZ management team shortly after.
16.p6: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.

15.title: The Largest House Boat Resort in the U.S. is Being Planned
15.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), on October 7th, 2025 has started a J.V. discussion with American Software Capital (D/B/A American Softbank Capital) to co-develop the largest house boat resort project on Paradise Island, Florida.
15.p2: According to David Champ, President and CEO of the company, as ASC Global Inc. is working on an ADU Space Capsule Prefab home project at its APOZ (Asia Pacific Opportunity Zone) business park in Texas, and house boat just happens to be one of the ADU (accessory dwelling unit) products it offers, therefore it makes perfect business sense to utilize this house boat product on the Paradise Island project in Florida.
15.p3: These house boats will be operated as rental properties and operated by ASC Global Inc.
15.p4: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.

14.title: TKCM is Invited by Taiwan to Attend the Aerospace & UAV Summit
14.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), was invited by the Ministry of Economic Affairs of Taiwan (R.O.C.) to attend the Aerospace and UAV Summit to be held in Taipei on October 23rd, 2025.
14.p2: According to David Champ, President and CEO of the company, this very important summit will be held at the Sheraton Grand Hotel in Taipei on October 23rd. It is focused to promote the collaboration between U.S. and Taiwan in 'Non-Red Supply Chain' and to encourage the Taiwanese companies to set up their manufacturing operations in the U.S.
14.p3: APOZ as the only publicly recognized FTZ + QOZ dual-status Business Park (Foreign Trade Zone and Qualified Opportunity Zone) in the U.S. today, it is the most favorable and ideal location for these Taiwanese companies (including some of the U.S. domestic companies from other states) to establish their production and manufacturing operations.
14.p4: The FTZ + QOZ dual-status APOZ Business Park can provide tremendous savings on tariff and duties, along with the convenience for re-exporting to the global market and unprecedented savings on capital gain taxes, creating a true win-win strategic alliance relationship between the U.S. and Taiwan.
14.p5: The delegation from ASC Global Inc. will also visit some of the local companies in Taiwan who have already expressed interests in setting up operations at APOZ, and certain government officials whom have been supporting the APOZ project since its inception.
14.p6: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.

13.title: APOZ is Getting Ready for the Very First Space Capsule Home Production Center
13.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), is getting ready to start the very first Space Capsule Home production facility in the U.S.
13.p2: According to Mr. David Champ, President and CEO of the company: 'We're building a new generation of modular camp pods - blending aesthetics, functionality, and compliance into one intelligent unit. Each StarPod features modern and advanced smart control systems, hurricane-rated structure, and sustainable materials, backed by ASTM and Miami-Dade certifications for deployment in high-wind zones like Florida and Texas.'
13.p3: Whether for eco-resorts, glamping hotels, disaster relief, or public shelters, StarPod offers rapid deployment and scalable living - redefining how we inhabit the outdoors.
13.p4: The product line will consist of two main categories - 20 ft. model (160 sq.ft) and 40 ft. model (320 sq.ft), each comes with A/C, full bath, micro kitchen with refrigerator and comfortable living space. This facility will be the very first HUD certified manufacturing facility in the U.S. with ASTM and DBPR / IBCC certifications.
13.p5: These products will have vast market demands in many market segments, including ADU (Accessory Dwelling Unit), tiny home development, glamping site, scenic resorts, Airbnb and many more. The starting price will be around $9,499 and up to $29,499. The gross profit margin will be around 20%, and the annual production capacity will be around 20,000 units.
13.p6: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.

12.title: Affordable Affordable Housing Market is On Its Rise
12.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), would like to mention and share with our investors, this special housing market segment has always been one of our business focuses, and we're very certain that this particular segment is on its rise already!
12.p2: According to Mr. David Champ, President & CEO of Token Communities, ASC Global Inc. will invest and build an affordable housing community on a site totaled around 100 acres. Each unit of the affordable condominium is expected to sell around $149K to $199K.
12.p3: We have done our studies and research in this particular market segment and found out that there are huge market demands in this segment. With the high interest rate and short supplies in the market now, we found that the affordable housing is not only popular among the first time home buyers, it is also very popular among the baby boomers who would like to downsize their living space.
12.p4: ASC Global Inc. will also incorporate the ADU Space Capsule Unit into the Affordable Housing community, they can be used as ADU (Accessory Dwelling Unit) for rental purposes, or Airbnb to help and ease the monthly mortgage obligations.

11.title: Paradise Island Development is in Discussion
11.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), is involved in a serious discussion with investor groups from Asia for the development of Paradise Island in Manatee County, Florida.
11.p2: The proposed plan is to build luxury waterfront condominium project totaling approximately 1,000 units, and a massive house boat community totaling around 100 units.
11.p3: Our initial thought and plan is to use the proceeds from this project to finance the company's massive APOZ Business Park in Texas. The project was valued at an amount exceeding a billion dollars, and the total sales amount is expected to exceed two billion dollars.
11.p4: David Champ, President and CEO of Token Communities, mentioned that, the negotiation is still on-going, and he is pretty optimistic about the outcome of this development project. He also stated: 'Although this is only a joint-venture project, the high profit from this project can help the company to carry on building the APOZ with a much stronger and better position.'

10.title: A Waterfront Home for Everyone to Share!
10.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), is making an effort to promote a very unique home-ownership program in Manatee County, Florida - A waterfront home for everyone to share!
10.p2: The management has been working on this project to address the affordable home issues for young generation families and retired baby boomers. Acquisition of the Paradise Island has been pending due to the approval of some use variations from the county government, and the company is finally moving forward on this long awaiting project.
10.p3: Although the current design is still subject to change, the company is committed to a time-share waterfront community with beautiful landscaping and recreational amenities, and the price range will be around $199K to $249K.

9.title: APOZ Management Team Attended Houston Summit
9.p1: David Champ, President and CEO of Token Communities, attended the AABC business summit held in Houston on September 13th, and gave a presentation of APOZ during the summit, and the responses from the attendees and the organizer were very encouraging.
9.p2: During this summit, some of the local real estate and commercial project sponsors came and talked to the company, they were very interested in becoming our joint-venture partners to develop APOZ together. Mr. Champ also mentioned: 'Some of the local real estate professionals also showed great interest in taking over sales and marketing on our 'Affordable Living Community' project at APOZ.'

8.title: Hydraulic Valve Manufacturer to Relocate Manufacturing to APOZ Business Park
8.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), is excited to announce that a hydraulic valve manufacturing company is planning on relocating its current manufacturing operations in Dongguan and Shenzhen to APOZ Business Park (Asia Pacific Opportunity Zone) in Texas.
8.p2: This company is the largest manufacturer of directional control valves for aerial work platforms used in the largest aerial and scissor lift company in the U.S. The company's annual sale in the U.S. will be around $50 to $60 million.
8.p3: According to David Champ, President & CEO of the company, along with the tariff (25% to 55%) imposed on this particular type of product from China, this company found that the costs associated with importing from China have gone up so much, and they feel it is time for them to relocate their operations to APOZ, and that will not only save the company a significant amount of money in tariff & duties due to APOZ's FTZ + QOZ dual status and other tax incentives, but also provide a better sense of security in supply chain management.
8.p4: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.

7.title: Domestic Interest in APOZ is Growing
7.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), is excited to announce that not only the U.S. domestic interests in APOZ is increasing rapidly, interests from overseas manufacturing operations are increasing as well.
7.p2: According to David Champ, President & CEO of the company, the management team of APOZ has been traveling and touring relentlessly both domestically and overseas to promote and market the APOZ Business Park to prospective companies and tenants.
7.p3: Since APOZ is the only publicly recognized FTZ + QOZ dual-status industrial/commercial business park in the U.S. today, the interests from both domestic and overseas have been very strong.
7.p4: Many U.S. companies from other states are seeking to relocate their operations to APOZ in order to take advantage of the tremendous tariff benefits being offered by the FTZ dual-status, along with the unprecedented tax savings offered by QOZ. Many of the companies from overseas are also planning on relocating their operations to APOZ for the same beneficial reasons.
7.p5: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.

6.title: APOZ will Offer a Fully Solar-Powered Residential Community in Texas
6.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), is pleased to announce that the APOZ affordable residential community will be offering fully solar-powered homes with our joint venture partner from Taiwan.
6.p2: According to David Champ, President & CEO of the company, the company will execute a Memorandum of Understanding with a leading solar panel manufacturer from Taiwan soon, and the solar panel products will be built and manufactured right at the APOZ Business Park, which again will save a lot of tariff and customs duties due to the unique status of dual FTZ + QOZ at the APOZ Business Park.
6.p3: This fully solar-powered home can help the home owner to reduce and lower the monthly mortgage obligations significantly!

5.title: NYC Conference Discussed APOZ's Strategic Planning
5.p1: David Champ, President and CEO of Token Communities, attended a business conference in New York City on July 18th, 2025 and has given an overall and detailed introduction and presentation of the APOZ Business Park to a group of business professionals from different industries.
5.p2: The overall response from the attendees was very encouraging, particularly the ones who have already suffered from the high tariff and import duties. Some expressed strong interests and wish to be contacted by the management of the APOZ Business Park in the near future.
5.p3: This presentation not only promoted and marketed the APOZ Business Park to a wider audience and to the industries of different sectors, but also sparked some serious investment interests from both domestic and foreign investors.

4.title: Luxury EV Manufacturer from China Expected to Move Production to Texas
4.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), has reached a preliminary agreement with LOBO EV Technologies Ltd. in Chengdu, China to relocate its luxury EV production facility to the APOZ Business Park in Texas.
4.p2: LOBO EV is a luxury EV builder specialized in high-end customized EVs, with its clientele covering mostly the high net-worth individuals from all over the world. Due to its custom-built nature, each build will be priced from the low 6 digits to high 7 digits.
4.p3: Its top model ME7 was designed and built on the original platform of Porsche Panamera, and its latest version comes with a twin electric motor with an output of 800 HP and driving range around 350 miles, with a top speed of 172 mph and body style of GT-Cross Coupe, and 0-60 mph in 3.8 seconds. This kind of performance is compatible with Porsche Taycan and BMW i7, along with the price tag of around $800K to $900K.
4.p4: The entry level model of Lightning Cat comes with a price tag of around $145K, and it is expected to be unveiled late this year. The front emblem of 'LOBO' will be replaced by some top European brand in the near future, and the LOBO brand will be discontinued eventually.
4.p5: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.

3.title: APOZ Management Team Attended Shanghai Conference
3.p1: David Champ, President and CEO of Token Communities, attended a China-U.S. business summit held in Shanghai on May 16-18th, and gave a keynote speech and presentation of APOZ during the summit, and the responses from the attendees were very enthusiastic.
3.p2: Mr. Champ also mentioned, numerous Chinese business owners and entrepreneurs approached him and expressed strong interests in relocating their operations to APOZ. Many of them have already suffered tremendous amount of losses on tariff and duties, by relocating or establishing operations at APOZ, they can save a lot on tariff and duties due to the APOZ's dual-status benefits (FTZ + QOZ).
3.p3: Mr. Champ also stated: 'The purpose of this trip is to promote and market the APOZ Business Park to the business owners and investors in China, and it turned out to be very successful. Not only companies from China approached us, many companies from other parts of Asia also responded with strong interests.'

2.title: APOZ Management Team Attended ITC Houston Conference
2.p1: David Champ, President and CEO of Token Communities, attended the annual Texas Investment & Trade Conference held in Houston on May 22-23rd, and presented the APOZ project to a group of investors and business owners from all over the country.
2.p2: APOZ is the very first and only FTZ + QOZ dual-status Business Park publicly recognized in the U.S. today. The unique dual-status can provide prospective tenants and business partners with tremendous benefits on tariff & duties savings, along with the unprecedented capital gain tax savings provided by the QOZ tax deferment and exclusion program.
2.p3: During the conference, numerous attendees approached Mr. Champ and expressed strong interests in setting up operations at APOZ. Mr. Champ also stated: 'The response from this conference was overwhelming, and I think many of them will become our tenants and business partners in the near future.'

1.title: APOZ Groundbreaking Ceremony Held with Great Success
1.p1: ASC Global Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Token Communities (OTC: TKCM), successfully held a groundbreaking ceremony for the Asia Pacific Opportunity Zone (APOZ) Business Park on June 2nd, 2025 in Brownsville, Texas.
1.p2: The event was attended by local government officials, business leaders, and community members, marking a significant milestone for the region's economic development. The APOZ Business Park is strategically positioned as the first and only dual FTZ + QOZ status business park in the United States.
1.p3: According to David Champ, President & CEO of Token Communities, 'This groundbreaking represents more than just the beginning of construction - it represents a new era of international trade and economic opportunity for South Texas and the entire United States. The dual FTZ and QOZ status of APOZ provides unprecedented advantages for businesses looking to establish operations in a tax-advantaged environment.'
1.p4: The APOZ Business Park will feature state-of-the-art infrastructure, including advanced logistics facilities, manufacturing spaces, and commercial developments. The project is expected to create thousands of jobs and attract significant foreign and domestic investment to the region.
1.p5: For any further information, please contact Mr. David Champ at (631) 397-1111.
